name: 2D Grappler [unfinished fragment]
description:
HERE BE DRAGONS: This is a game that was never meant to be released in this state. As such, the quality may be subpar and the game might be full of bugs. It might even randomly crash.

A game submitted to the Fragment Jam. This is a rough prototype I made in early 2013 that uses a single game mechanic: a 2D grappling hook. There's not much to do, but it feels cool to launch yourself in the air, so there's that.

Controls: 

Arrow Keys / WASD: Move around
Left Click:  Shoot grappling hook 
Right Click: Release grappling hook
Escape: Quit

Credit

The art is by Kenney.
